Body.Content:
Effective January 26, 2024, Power Pages Design Studio cannot be accessed on Firefox.

How does this affect me?
You can use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome to access Power Pages Design Studio. Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome are the support web browsers for Power Pages Design Studio.

To learn more, see Power Pages system requirements and limits..

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Pages Design Studio cannot be accessed on Firefox
